SEARCH
Module app
Package appv2.core

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
appv2.core.PlayerController
public class PlayerController extends Object

Represents the will of the human player. All input and output for one player is handled here.
Also holds relevant information about the player, such as his name, his affection, his cards, etc.

      private boolean bSignalPlayerNextTurn
      Deprecated.

      See Also:

    • playCard

      public ECardResponse playCard(boolean bHandCard, StringBuilder stdoutPipeline, StringBuilder stderrPipeline) throws RuntimeException
      Parameters:
      bHandCard - Whether the player wants to play the card in his hand or the card on the table.
      stdoutPipeline - The pipeline to write the stdout of the card to.
      stderrPipeline - The pipeline to write the stderr of the card to.
      Returns:
      The response state of the card played.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If a return code is no recognized.
      See Also:
      • ECardResponse

    • getSumOfAffectionInDiscardPile

      public int getSumOfAffectionInDiscardPile()
      Returns:
      Gets the sum of affection of all discarded cards. Used to determine the winner of the game in case of a tie.
      See Also:
      • GameMode.applyRoundWinBonusToPlayers()

    • getAffectionTokens

      public int getAffectionTokens()
      Returns:
      The number of affection tokens the player has (they are needed to win the game).

    • setKnockedOut

      public void setKnockedOut(boolean bKnockedOut, boolean bSignalPlayerNextTurn, String message)

      Implements the default behavior of the player when he is knocked out of the round.
      This also includes discarding his hand and table card to his discarded cards pile.

      Important: A player should always be knocked out with this method.

      Parameters:
      bKnockedOut - Whether the player is knocked out of the round or not.
      bSignalPlayerNextTurn - Whether the player should be signaled at the start of his next turn.
      message - The message to be displayed to the player at the start of his next turn.
      See Also:
      • bSignalPlayerNextTurn

    • getMessageForPlayerNextTurn

      public String getMessageForPlayerNextTurn()
      Returns:
      The message to be displayed to the player at the start of his next turn.

    • setMessageForPlayerNextTurn

      public void setMessageForPlayerNextTurn(String messageForPlayerNextTurn)
      Parameters:
      messageForPlayerNextTurn - The message to be displayed to the player at the start of his next turn.

    • hasCountessWilhelmina

      public boolean hasCountessWilhelmina()
      Returns:
      True, if the player has the Countess Wilhelmina in his hands.
      See Also:
      • CountessWilhelmina

    • addToDiscardedCardsPile

      public void addToDiscardedCardsPile(ACard card)

      Adds a card to the players discarded pile.

      Warning: You should always call the cards playEffect method beforehand.

      Parameters:
      card - The card to add to the discarded cards pile.
      See Also:
      • PrincessAnnette
      • ACard.playCard(PlayerController, boolean, String, StringBuilder, StringBuilder)
